name: The Utility Room VR
description:
"The Utility Room" is not a traditional VR game. Whilst it does contain gameplay elements it can be best described as a journey, one that takes you 'behind the scenes' to a barren world filled with megalithic stone beings and environments.

You have traveled 3 million years to its entrance at the edge of the universe, a famous cosmic landmark many know of but never visit. Beyond the door, a supreme being known only as "Bin man" oversees the maintenance and heavy lifting required to keep existence stable and temporal. It is rumored that he was personally employed 13.8 billion years ago as the cosmic caretaker.

You will not belong here and nothing will account for your safety.
